entry.title: Schools
entry.summary: The Education Team would love to hear from schools and groups who would be interested in visiting Woodcroft Wildspace for an interesting and enjoyable educational experience. Contact the Woodcroft Education Team by email: education@woodcroft.org.uk or phone 0203 642 1543 and leave us a message. We…
entry.content:
The Education Team would love to hear from schools and groups who would be interested in visiting Woodcroft Wildspace for an interesting and enjoyable educational experience.
Contact the Woodcroft Education Team by email: education@woodcroft.org.uk
or phone 0203 642 1543 and leave us a message.

We welcome bookings of primary school classes (maximum 30 children, broken down to three groups of 10) on Tuesday or Friday mornings. A session lasts about two hours or so (from about 9.45am til noon). We offer three or four activities depending on the season or as requested per visit. Activities include: pond dipping, searching for mini beasts, exploring plants and tree identification. Each activity is lead by an experienced volunteer guide and rotated to the three groups in turn. 

A risk assessment will be provided and please download the education leaflet below to keep for reference. Please note that it is strongly recommended that any accessibility issues are discussed before booking so that we can arrange reasonable adjustments. We look forward to seeing you.

Sponsors

entry.content:
Our grateful thanks for the following people who have given their support
GENERAL SPONSORS .
Enfield Council for their help and support and permission to use the ground.
Enfield Parks Dept. for provision of wood chippings for the paths
 
BUSINESS SPONSORS
The following businesses have kindly donated prizes for our fund raising events or supplied goods and services free of charge, or sent teams of volunteers to work on the site.
RICOH

entry.title: Donate
entry.summary: Please scan QR code below or click Donate to make a donation. All donations to Woodcroft Wildspace very much appreciated. SumUp does not pass on any personal details to us about your donation, only the code that it provides to you on completing the transaction.
entry.content:
Please scan QR code below or click  Donate to make a donation.

All donations to Woodcroft Wildspace very much appreciated.

SumUp does not pass on any personal details to us about your donation, only the code that it provides to you on completing the transaction.

It would be helpful for us to be able to relate donations to donors, for example when making a booking, so if you could please email the code to enquiries@woodcroft.org.uk with a short note about your kind donation that would be helpful.

If you would like to remain anonymous that is of course fine, thank you for your donation.

Either way, many thanks for your donation. We will put it to good use in maintaining the Wildspace.

entry.title: Example Featured Post without a Featured Image
entry.summary: Wildstock is back! Yes, Wildstock '24 is gearing up for another fun-packed musical extravaganza. Bring a picnic and chill in the beautiful meadow in Woodcroft Wildspace. Enjoy the craft beers and wines courtesy of The Little Green Dragon while listening to a selection of local…
entry.content:
Wildstock is back!  Yes, Wildstock '24 is gearing up for another fun-packed musical extravaganza. Bring a picnic and chill in the beautiful meadow in Woodcroft Wildspace. Enjoy the craft beers and wines courtesy of The Little Green Dragon while listening to a selection of local musicians throughout the afternoon.
Tickets available from https://buytickets.at/enfieldchaserotaryclub/1201210

All funds raised go to local charities - Little Sparks Enfield, Cooking Champions, and Woodcroft Wildspace - all fantastic local causes.

Location - Woodcroft Wildspace N21 3PT
